There is a restraint called the United States

There are many beauty of human nature, often nourish us, warm us, touched us. The beauty of humanity is like a beacon, Zhaoche the human sky; also like leaf Bi boat, carrying us towards the other side of life and success. Just as birds need the sky, fish need to rivers, as human nature can not do without this beauty. Experienced life in the dark clouds, I feel more, there is a beauty of human nature, conservation, and must have. This beauty is called restraint. Restraint is a will, a kind of experience, is a restrained beauty, the beauty of patience. Almost all the difference, those who get more successful, must be a person who has the beauty of restraint. Restraint of a strong people, strong and often life masters of their own destiny. They are due to restraint, and to maintain a strong will and temper, and to continue to resist the desire to give up a variety of tempting; due to restraint, and can be doing things calm, poised, outspoken, fame and fortune; also due restraint, and effective means to resolve and an avalanche of unexpected troubles and disputes, challenges and tests. So elegant gesture years wading the river, walking calmly walked to the road of life. We can say that it is restrained, continued harvest of our life in every season. Restraint is an accomplishment, a state, a philosophy of interaction with others. Person's life I do not know how many have to face slander, and mistreatment and misunderstanding. It can be said within the family and colleagues, friends, neighbors, familiar and unfamiliar, intentional and unintentional disputes, is continuous. We "seek temporary gas", is often not conducive to conflict or conflict resolution, more often caused by a lose-lose situation. Now, because of trivial bickering between husband and wife, and go to war until the divorce is everywhere. Because they do not exercise restraint, to bring our regret and hurt too much. This requires us to cultivate the quality of restraint, generosity of mind, in case of conflicts and disputes, not confusion, to keep calm and proper demeanor. In the non-principle, is not preoccupied with things the best way is detached, the smile. Restraint is not blindly submissive, but doing things to have a peace of mind. We should not take other people's mistakes and ulterior motives, to punish themselves, hurt themselves. We should not fall into the trap of other people and tongue marshes, the village women to become squalling, gentle sweeping. Even if it takes heavy return fire, but also anger outside a chic square within. Restraint is a kind of wisdom, is a mature human self-improvement and abide by the principle of life from the building line of defense. Yuhenantian knowing a person's desires can not all be met, why should know not to succeed. Gentleman should be gaining money, despite the proper way to pick up, no way abandoned at. This world is you is you, not you, will you eventually eat spit. Could not abide by this bottom line, eventually suffered dire consequences. Joie de vivre, the courage to seek temporary, the result is often live to regret. To learn to exercise restraint, not to exceed the bottom line of the principle of life, so that restraint to keep your life tends to balance, so that restraint to keep your relationships tend to harmony, restraint to keep your life colorful. Men will become more generous because of restraint and attractive, a woman will become more beautiful because of restraint and attractive. Restraint is a beauty of human nature, life is a good medicine. Restrain ourselves, we will be a lifetime, but also make us stronger.

Jilin 2. 3 billion investment in the quality of work stoppag

Jilin 2. 3 billion investment in the quality of work stoppage deposit pay talks railway workers stay
BEIJING, Oct. 23 White Mountain electric and Jingyu County, Jilin Province Fusong within a total investment of 2. 3 billion railway project, recently accused of illegal sub-contracted to a "fake" company and did cook, "fully understand the construction Bridge "contractors, pouring concrete piers should, hit into a lot of stones cut corners to form a huge security risk. 23, the reporters arrived at the Jingyu County, Fusong several railway project site and found that site has been suspended, almost can not see construction workers, but few discuss individual salary workers still adhere to.

In 2007, Jingyu to Songjianghe railway project is approved, then set the line length of 74. 1 kilometers, the project duration is 3 years, started construction in 2007, 2010, to construct. But for some reason the project has been no construction. After the lapse of two years, until 2009, approved for construction by the Ministry of Railways, the project owner for the Shenyang Railway Bureau.

Project since construction started in 2010, just one year after cessation. Reasons for the cessation of the Ministry of Railways, said the information is released to the public works a security risk, the ongoing investigation. The local people and workers have claimed that, as early as before the incident, some sites will appear "abnormal. "

Jingyu County Department of Transportation deputy director, told reporters the relevant studies, in 2009, the local that build the railway to the news, everyone was excited, after all, wearing for decades a "poor counties" where the hat, too need a railway line to promote the local economy, in order to meet the railway's construction, Jingyu County has also set up a "section of the railway land acquisition Jingyu Leading Group Office", with the shortest time to complete the demolition mission, to meet the project construction conditions.

"From the June and July they began to lay it! " Off studies introduced a few months ago, Jingyu several sites within the suspension will have many sites are known as Project "no money", had to halt and wait money and then build. But they saw a few days ago from the network "bridge" (head Songhua River Road II Bridge) reported the accident only after cessation of the reason is not money, but the project quality problems.

For quality problems, said he was off school as "distressed. " Off studies that project length of 70 km, of which 50 km in the territory of Jingyu, Jingyu order for the project can be completed smoothly, put a lot of manpower, material, after all, as Jingyu's first railway, which is the local several lifetimes of hope, now stopped, which makes a lot of anxious people.

Reporters followed along in the project found that more than one construction site, "Jingyu to Songjianghe line project" all the construction site have been suspended, almost can not see construction workers. After a search, the reporter was in the No. 3 iron garden tunnel construction site and saw the two sites, "those left behind. "

GUO, 38-year-old, is near the city of Guiyang Liupanshui an ordinary farmer. 23 noon, when correspondents along the mountain road into the site, when folks GUO and workers are preparing a noon meal.

Of a dollar a frog, and a few potatoes, stewed together, it becomes a day of food. GUO, said he was in March this year, was introduced to start work on site was good about 3500 dollars a month, but starting from the work so far, almost never received the full amount of wages.

GUO memories, opening their wages, the site manager will try to shift with a variety of reasons, apart from cost of living outside, to open a lot of people do not pay. Finally, some workers can not afford, they have left the site, which also caused several site downtime.

A month ago, the site to a sum of money, according to finish the first period wage workers receive after they left the site. The GUO, Yang and other workers to do is to work late, pick up the money but also in the end, in front of people picking up money, it's their turn, he was not money.

"We had to wait! " GUO, said numerous experiences of finding managers that they should pay, but the manager said the project is stopped, and now no money, he can not help.

Yang workers from Henan Nanyang City, came to the site in February this year to work. Yang said, and site managers who are responsible for hiding them, because the site should continue to stay in the upper wages, they have their money to maintain much longer. To the end, they can only try to sell something to sustain life, not to the end of the message, they can only borrow money to return home the.
